text: Tamara dinanum anusarana karanara sivaya bija ko'ino visrvasa na karo, tame kahi do ke ninsanka satyamarga to phakata allahano ja che, (ane a pana kahe che ke teni vata para pana visrvasa na karo) ke ko'ine tena jevum apavamam ave jevum tamane apavamam avyum che, athava to e ke a loko tamara palanahara sathe jhaghado karase, tame kahi do ke krpa to allaha ta'alana ja hathamam che. Te jene icche tene ape, allaha ta'ala sarvagrahi ane jananara che
